__e: Your father and brother are gone, and you cannot change fate.
And after... his sister and her crew went missing and their stuff got found, suddenly, everyone I know just wanted to forget it.
In daylight, it felt like all my ghosts had disappeared and I saw the world exactly as it was.
Both of you disappeared from the club right around the same time.
All those people that were in the store with us, they just fucking vanished.
I'm losing over 200 quid a week and the only person who I know ain't on the fiddle is you.
